front.title: An SNMP MIB extension to RFC3591 to manage optical interface parameters of DWDM applications

abstract.t: This memo defines a module of the Management Information Base (MIB) used by Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) in TCP/IP- based internet. In particular, it defines objects for managing Optical parameters associated with Dense Wavelength Division Multiplexing (DWDM) interfaces. This is an extension of the RFC3591 to support the optical parameters described in ITU-T G.698.2. [ITU.G698.2] and used in ITU-T G.872. [ITU.G872] and ITU-T G.874.1. [ITU.G874.1] The MIB module defined in this memo can be used for Optical Parameters monitoring and/or configuration of the endpoints of Black Links.
